review: Opened the box, set it up and started to watch very good movies using my prime account.  The videos ran without stopping, when I paused, it paused, and when I exited, it exited. The remove is very simplistic and I may train one of my smart remotes to immulate the fire stick remote. The only drawback is the need for more power to run the stick. The cord is a little short for what I needed, but it works.  I like this enough to buy another unit for my other TV set. I would recommend this to everyone.
